1.content:
Mythic City a city of all sorts of creatures, With Several districts to help communications and develop relationships with many various Mythological creatures. The first of the districts in Mythic City is called The Forest district. It is the district that is the most natural of the City and many creatures who prefer nature live in this district. Such As Fairies, Werewolves, Nymphs, Dryads and Elves. Of Course some Nature loving humans live here as well, but not much.

The residential district is where the majority of humans live in Mythic City. however not every creature in the residential District is human. In fact dwarves, gnomes, and other creatures live here as well. Of course this isn't as great as the most busiest district of all. Fortunately for this district most homes are a fair price.

The Business District is where most deals, hospitals and various business can be found of course much of the building here are built pretty well, and go up very high. Perfect place for Gargoyles, Griffons and others such as Vampires to live without having to worry too much. Then after that there is The Harbor where Mermaids and all sorts of water creatures reside. Now which district is your character going to be from. If you don't want to pick a district then there is the pre- made character options where you could look at pre-made characters and get on with the story.
1.title: A New City Adventure Awaits!

11.content: The pass twenty years were one of confusion and chaos for many, but you live in the forest district. A district where many creatures who love nature tend to live in a city. Some of opted to even live in actual forest away from all of humanity. Despite all the tension and uneasiness for those who aren't used to the ways of the forest. You feel welcome and at most home here. The forest district fells natural to you because you are a....
11.title: The Forest district

choices: No, I want to be Something Else
111.content: You are a fairy who lives in the forest district, which is surrounded by trees and where the creature and humans looked to be living in trees rather than actual houses, but you know that some of them are actual tress and others are houses. Fortunately as a fairy you are six inches tall but thankfully have the ability of flight. Of course there is still one more question to be answered before you can begin. Are you male or female?
111.title: Fairy

1111.content:
You are a female fairy who lives in the forest district of Mythic City. A City filled with all sorts of mythic Creatures. The Forest district was the most comforting to you. As everything you would need is here. Of course being a fairy you know fairy type magic as well as having the ability to fly due to you having wings. The only difference was that not all of your neighbors in this area were Fairies. Many other Mythical Creatures lived here as well.

Today was the first day of you living in this particular area however. As You had only just recently moved in to the city. As you began to get all of your things adjusted you decided to...
1111.title: A Fairys' Tale

choices: " No, I don't even have a Husband yet!"
11111.content:
You decide to Meet the Neighbors of your community in the Forest District. Being a Fairy you had quite the small house, but for others, there house were quite big. You went in and knocked at the door of the house that was the closest to yours. You would hope to be happy to meet your new neighbors. You knocked on the door awaiting for them to answer. When they came out you found out that your new neighbors were Werewolves.

" Hell, Nice to meet you I just moved here so I thought it would be nice to greet the neighbors." You tell them. Fortunately they then give you a friendly smile.

" Nice to meet you, my name's Grace Wulfenberg." Grace said. Although she was a werewolf she was quite nice. It was then you two began to chat some more.

" How long have you lived in this city Grace?" You asked.

" Ten years, This city is still quite new, but the ideal of this city sounded like the perfect place to raise some kids without the worry about them being hunted by some idiot who didn't know better." Grace replied.

" Really, How many kids do you have?"

" Only one right now, but we're hoping to get another two sometime soon. So we can be a family and a decent sized pack." Grace answered then proceeded to ask you a question. " You've been asking a lot about me, but what about you? Do you have any Kids?" Grace asked you.

You answered her by saying....
11111.title: Meet the Neighbors

choices: Male A rare choice for this pick.
Female, Now Get off my lawn
112.content: You are a Dryad who lives in the forest district and helps protect it form those who would find it harm, especially since to a Dryad a home is their very life force. Living and protecting the forest district of course comes natural to you. Fortunately most of those who have chosen to live in the forest district agree with this opinion. Especially if it helps t hem protect their own homes. Of course their still remains the question of are you male or female?
112.title: Dryad

choices: Alpha Female Better then First Option
Not a WereWolf, A Were/ Something Else
113.content: You are a werewolf a creature that has the ability to transform into a wolf form, and a more humanoid form your kind has existed for thousand of years, been hunted and despised, and has great tragedies and triumphs. Now for the first time in years you no longer have to hide from anyone and now you can finally settle down and create your own pack. Of course there still remains a question to be answered. Are you Male or Female?
113.title: Werewolf

1133.content: Okay, Basically you are not a werewolf. But you are still something of a were something. So what kind of Werewolf, but not were wolf thing are you going to be? Perhaps instead of a wolf you are a werecat? or maybe even a weregoat perhaps? Then again maybe you are something far more ridiculous?
1133.title: What Kind of Were Are you?

choices: Only Partial Elf and Something Else
114.content: You are an Elf for the most part a side from your ears you look very much humanoid. Your kind has existed alongside humanity in secret for a long time. Unfortunately due to some rather unusual circumstances, most have considered your kind to be thought of quite differently than what it was. Mostly thanks to certain Christmas specials. Although you groan at the thought of such things, you know it is part of your history no matter how skewered it actually is. Of course there still remains the next are you a male or a Female elf?
114.title: Elf

1142.content: You are a Daring Female elf, Living in the Forest District of the City. Aside from being your typical elf. You do your best to keep the Forest district looking as great as it could be. There are many things people ask of you especially when it comes to your elven heritage and Santa. Thankfully you've yet to snap at any of these people for asking such questions. Mostly cause of human television has a certain view for elves. While it would please you to educate some of them about elven ways. You have to focus on your main job today, which is..
1142.title: A Daring Female

1143.content: So you are not a full elf, meaning only one of your parents is completely an Elf. Are you going for the traditional half elf? Or are you going to do something more interesting. Such as Part Elf Part Dragon perhaps? Or is it something far more unique then that sort of combination? In short aside from Elf what is your other half of you?
1143.title: Only Partial Elf and Something Else

115.content: Okay so you aren't any of the previous mentioned species. If that's the case then perhaps you like another few options such as perhaps your a Hybrid of two different species? Or Maybe you'd like to try and be a human living in this district? Or perhaps your looking for something more interesting than that? If so what are you?
115.title: Something Else

12.content: Not wanting to live out in a city that doesn't really look like a city. You live in a Modern Suburban area. The walls, the buildings and some bit of community with a little bit of nature really does it for you. Unlike those w ho live in the Forest district where you feel you could explore that district forever and still get lost. Yet Stone, and brick buildings are more akin to you. Of course the reason for that is because you are a...
12.title: The Residential District

121.content: Really out of all this you choose to be the most boring option you can think of? Well if that's your thing then congratulations! you are an Ordinary Human living in a city full of Mythological creatures. Some people think you are insane for living in such a city. However despite that you make it through the city with your boring and carefree everyday life. As for gender that comes easy as you are a...
121.title: Normal Human

1212.content: You are a normal female Human living in he residential district of Mythic City. The city full of monsters of Myth and legend and compared to everyone else you were just a simple human. Most humans think you were quite insane to move to a city where monsters lived. There are some that avoid it. While there were other humans that were trying to destroy this city that was made where mostly Mythical creatures exist. In fact it was because of those humans that you had to come to this city. You live alone in your house and have a decent job as...
1212.title: Female

1213.content: Okay you mean to tell me your not an ordinary Human, but if that is the case. Then you are very unusual aren't you. Instead there is a glint in your eye when you do the thing that makes you more than just some measly Human. A profound power that has existed because you aren't just any human. Rather you have a special heritage that has been kept secret for years and lived along with Humans. Now you have to deal with non humans beings interacting in the world that once was so normal. As for whether you trust them or not is eventually up to you. After all you are a...
1213.title: Not an Ordinary Human?

choices: Have a Wife and Three Kids?
Have a Husband and Twin children?
12131.content: So you are a Witch in a city full of mythical creatures. Although they had come out. Witches themselves had existed for a long time and had no reason to really come out of hiding. However fortunately in this city even one such as yourself can be considered a rarity amongst the many Mythical beings that live here. Living in the residential district is easy for you, and provides you with the least amount of strength. However there are a few you wish would just leave you alone. As far as your house and family is concerned you...
12131.title: Witch!

121313.content:
…..Have a husband and twin children, Your children are both girls who would become witches when they reach the proper age. As of right now they are about only Three years old. Then there is your husband James who is currently working at the moment and unavailable to assist you with anything. He has been working as a peacemaker between all the Mythological creatures. In order to make sure that all disputes between the different Mythological Creatures are solved fairly and justly. But basically your a husband is a judge in the Mythic City Court. Because of this there are many people who try to win him over with either magical means, or by bribes. Thankfully James doesn't like it, when people try to buy his decision.

As for your two young twin girls. their names are Janice and June. They can be quite a handful at times. But being a mother it is your responsibility to look after them as the best you can. In ten years time these two three year old girls will inherit the powers of a witch. But until that time they will grow up as normal little girls. As for the job you do other than raising the twins. You have an actual job that you get paid for which is...
121313.title: Have a Husband and Twin children?

1213133.content:
Teaching Magic to others. You know that Magic is an important asset. Especially for Mythic City, Where magic is quite abundant. However rather then have a secret job where you have to teach magic to your girls secretly. You moved away from your home, so when your girls are old enough they can then use their magic freely without any of the restrictions you had to go through in your previous city. Aside from that it was also getting too dangerous for you to continue to live there. Especially since their had began to be rumors of people hunting Witches in that city. You even remembered seeing on the news a family of witches being killed in broad daylight. The weird thing about that case was that, those witches had previously chosen to give up their magic and yet they were still being persecuted. Mythic City represents a chance to change all of that. Yet a part of you still feels unease that the troubles from home will come to this city.

You remember what the head witch told you about this city and it's rules. She had told you while you would be teaching magic. "Remember this city has it's own rules and structure, use magic with caution as there are many other species who have different magic, then our magic." With that guidance you decided that you would help those with magic by teaching it. Of course you had to make sure they followed all the rules of magic as well. You look at your twins and kiss your husband James for the day as you go and leave him to take care of them, while you go to your job at...
1213133.title: Teaching Magic

122.content: You aren't one of the typical standing tall and proud races or mythological creatures in fact you are quite humble and believe that everyone else is stretched too far. With this in mind being a gnome comes easy to you. Of course since you been one all your life it is the only world you know. However thanks to Mythic City you will get to be a part of other peoples world. Naturally the Residential District is the perfect location for you. As long as the neighbors don't mistake you for some sort of lawn gnome. The nerve of some of them. There still remains one question though are you a Male gnome or a Female gnome?
122.title: A gnome

123.content: You live proudly in the residential district. This district which was built with some of your fathers or perhaps even a little bit of your grandfather's work. Of course this is natural site for a dwarf to be proud of. Yes that is right you are a dwarf living in t he residential district and proud of the stone and even the wood work that was done to these homes. You are proud to live in this area and even more pride in your family for building such an area. As for whether your male or female, the answer to that is quite simple you are a...
123.title: A dwarf

choices: Neither of Those, Need More options!
124.content: Finally something a bit more interesting. You aren't just a creature but you are also half human as well. Which of course makes for some pretty interesting complications. The only question now is what kind of Half breed of a creature are you? Well for now let's look at some of the options. Are you part human and part....
124.title: Half human/ And Something Else

13.content: The hustle and Bustle of the city is your thing. You don't like to live in a quiet place of your own. Even within the business district you have plenty of what you need here. Including some rather interesting room mates. Of course not everything here is good and there are some that will do some quite shady business in this area. However you know that this is the best area for you because you are a...
13.title: The Business District

131.content: You don't live in neither the forest or the residential area, instead you live in an apartment with a view of the fantastic city. Of course every city has it's dark side to it. And this city is no exception. So as a Gargoyle a protector, you try and keep the city safe from those who would wish it harm. There are those who fear you and those who find you quite charming, but as for the rest they will have to wait until they meet you. For you are a...
131.title: Gargoyle

1311.content:
….Male Gargoyle, Living in the business district in the city. You try to protect the people of this city form the scum of the earth. You would try water but being made of stone, that doesn't really work well for you. You live and work at your apartment which is also your place of business. You are not just a Gargoyle, but a detective as well. You try to discover the truth about many of the cases, with the best of your abilities and your little Fairy partner.

Shortly after a small break and enjoying the view from your apartment. Your partner comes in and tells you...
1311.title: Gargoyle Private Detective

132.content: Griffin. You are a griffin who live in t he business district area of the city. Where most of the hustle and bustle usually take place. However not all that hustle is good, and there a lot of devious people around these parts from common to corrupt businessman to irritating roommates. These are your daily woes you deal with as part of living in an apartment complex of t he city. Of course there still remains one question though are you male or female?
132.title: Griffin

choices: " Chief, I demand I get a raise!"
1321.content:
You are a male Griffon. You have an important responsibility of being the Chief of the Police. You are an enforcer of the law. Whether someone is breaking law through criminal means or just getting a ticket for ignoring the flight traffic laws in the city. You are one of the people most do not like to see. There are some who run, but fortunately you are able to catch them with quite ease. Fortunately being Chief of Police, means you know when and where to call for help. But most of the time you end up being the help. If there was anything you didn't like about being the Chief of Police, it was all the paperwork you had to do. It was a big responsibility and required quite a bit of paper work.

Another co worker comes in to your office and then tells you....
1321.title: Chief Griffon

133.content: Vampire. A denizen of the night who prowls off the livings succulent fresh nectar that arrives in your necks. Living in the business district provides you with plenty of morsels to prey on. Of course if you into fast food you could always choose a quick bite out of your roommates. Despite all that there still remains a single focused question on your platter. Are you male or Female?
133.title: Vampire

134.content: You are a harpy. A female bird women living in the city in the Business district. You are sight for many to behold, especially the humans who have never seen your kind before. Despite this you have a job in this city to do, and you do it as well as you can do giving the circumstances that you have. As for what that job is well that is quite simple as you are a...
134.title: Harpy

1341.content: You are a High School teacher. You teach at the Public School of Mythic City High and you can recall many jokes in the years past before about some people calling their teachers Harpies. Yet you are one and a High School teacher of no doubt. Thankfully the amount of teachers in the region are quite different. English is taught by a Griffin. A Human teaches various languages. As for what kind of teacher you are, some would like what you teach, other hate you with how strict you are with them. Then you have the few goofballs you get every single year, that seem to think your class is going to be easy. Unfortunately for them it wont be, mainly because you teach..
1341.title: High School Teacher

14.content: None of the previous district really do it for you. Sure the forest area has a lot of trees, and the residential area has a lot of homes for those that like them. The business district is nice but they don't have the one thing you need the most. From what type of creature you are however w hat you need the most is Water. Of course for all those who like to live near water the harbor is quite nice, and even has some decent beaches, of course you are a...
14.title: The Harbor

141.content: The forest district would be a fine district if it weren't for the fact that you were in need of water. That is because you are either a Mermaid or a Merman. living under the sea is all that you have ever known. Fortunately the Harbor has some of the best undersea homes available. As well as some great beaches near it as an added bonus. Now if only you could get some humans to treat your ocean better than they have. Are you a Merman or Mermaid?
141.title: Merperson

choices: Getting People to Listen to you
1412.content:
You are not a merman, You are a mermaid. Who lives under the bay. For years Mermaids and many sea creatures like you have had to deal with humans polluting the sea and your waters. As a result you lost many Homes and friends due to the ignorance of humanity and it's own selfishness. With Mythic City however you hope to end the human pollution threat that plagues the rest of world. Especially since while some seem to care about it. Others just completely didn't. As far as they were concerned as long as they didn't see it, No harm no foul. Now with the existence of Mermaids confirmed you could actually use some Water Camera's to show these humans who didn't care exactly how much of the sea there pollutants affected.

But first you would first have to make sure, every one keeps the Harbor district clean. Then you would ensure they do all to the same districts. Luckily thanks to a magic Amulet you are able to walk on land until dusk falls. However your first challenge on land would be...
1412.title: Pro- Active Mermaid

15.content:
From this choice you get to choose yourself to be a premade Character and decided which one you would want to be. Each character will be described in some way or form. With that out of way let's begin with the first pre-made Character for this story.

Name: Anthony Wolf
Gender: Male
Creature Type: Werewolf
District location: Forest District
Age: 16
Likes: Meat, Sports
Dislikes: Eating Greens, Being Called a Dog
Personality: Anthong is Passionate about eveything he does,k However he lacks patience and can occasionally be tempermental especially if Someone calls him a dog.

That is the first choice for the premade character secion, but is this the story you wist to tell or is it someone else? If this isn't your choice then let's move on ot the next character in this section.

Name: Maggie Springs
Gender: Female
Creature Type: Half Human/Half Fairy
Age: 13
District Location: Residential District
Likes: Friends, Family
Dislikes: Being Pressured to Choose Something.
Personality: A bit Shy and unsure of herself due to her unique heritage. Especially with her mom being a fairy and her father being a human. When she feels and pressured she will often unconcioiusly use her magic to turn herself fairy sized, however when feeling very confident she will become human sized.

If this is the character for you, then feel free to choose Maggie Springs if not well heres the next premade character.

Name: Vlad Bloodstone
Gender: Male
Creature Type: Vampire
Age: 15
District Location: Business District
Likes: Himself
Dislikes: People who Dislike him on Social Media
Personality: Vlad is know for being arrogant, obnoxious, and a bit too full of himself. As far as he is concerned he is the best thing to ever happen to this city, and He thanks each and everyone for sustianing his unparallelled existance.


Is The Vlad t he character you are hoping for, if not he's going to dislike you for disliking him, but who care on to the next character.

Name: Shelly Prawn
Gender: Female
Creature Type: Mermaid
Age: 14
District Location: Harbor District
Likes: Shiny things
Dislikes: Polluters and Pollution
Personality: Being a Mermaid and living under the sea she has seen all sorts of pollution that the humans have done to the sea and is very vocal about the environment. Most would call her quite the young activist herself.


Those are the four pre-made character that are for this interactive. Of course if none of these are your cup of tea, you could always Create your Own character. Well what will it be?
15.title: Pre- Made Characters

151.content:
This story is about Anthony Wolf a werewolf who lives in the Forest district of the first city to ever be housing Mythical Creatures and humans alongside together. It has been twenty years since the barrier separating the Humans form these creatures have broken down and yet none know the reason why. Some try to find out, but they are never heard of again, if they go down that route usually. Anthony Wolf's grandfather was one of the few who tried to uncover that mystery when he was just six years old. After that Anthony never heard anything about his grandfather again.

Ten years have passed since then and Anthony is now in Mythic City High. He is very talented and Athletic. His family consist of his Father Darryl Wolf an Accountant and His Mother Cherri Wolf who doesn't have a job due to the fact that she's looking after Anthony, and his brothers and sisters. He has his Older Sister Maria Wolf, His younger sister Cecily Wolf and finally the youngest of all his little brother Peter Wolf. That is the family of Anthony Wolf, but for now lets see what they are doing?
151.title: Anthony Wolf

choices: After you got home From School
1511.content:
Anthony and his family were playing a game of catch and chase. Where Him and his family would try to catch the ball and they would all Chase after the one who had the ball until they eventually threw it. It was a tough game but for a family of werewolves it was actually quite enjoyable. As the game continued Anthony had heard his Older sister Maria talk about something that would catch Anthony's interest.

" I wonder what the new neighbors are going to be like, the house next to ours has been sold for day's but we have no idea when they are coming." Maria said. She then ran and caught the ball as her other siblings came and continued the conversation.

" I don't know! But I hope they have kids, it'd be nice to have some one new to play with." Cecily said as she chased after her sister Maria attempting to get the ball.

" If they do have kids, better not be any more girls we've got enough as it is." Peter said flatly, while struggling as he was just about to get the ball from his Sister she threw it towards Anthony who was far away from where he was, Which meant that the target of the chase had to change.

" It's interesting to hear about the new neighbor we haven't even met them. I actually look forward to meeting them when we get the chance. " Anthony said. The werewolf children continued playing their game until dusk came, When they were utterly exhausted. It was by then their parent's had finally came home.

" Hello Children, I am sure you all have heard of the new neighbors moving right next to us. Be sure to greet them and be as friendly as possible as you can. " Your father said.

" Hey! Dad do you know what the neighbors, will be like are they going to be another family like us, or perhaps they would be more cat like and we can chase them..." Before your brother could continue his fantasy any longer your mother interrupted.

" Actually, yes We know who the neighbors are going to be we just met them earlier today, So don't get your hopes up. After all tomorrow is a School day and you all have school tomorrow."

"Awwww" All the children groaned after hearing that they have school tomorrow. Unfortunately for them their mother or father eluded the subject of what kind of neighbors they would be throughout the night. However you would eventually meet the new neighbors...
1511.title: Game Time

choices: Maggie Makes a Friend At School
152.content:
Your name is Maggie Springs and you are part fairy and part human. Twenty years ago that would have been impossible, but in the world you live in today it is actually quite possible. You live in the residential district of the first city to mix creatures of mythology and Humans together. You are thirteen years old and today is your first day of attending school that is not completely filled with fairies.

you look at your clock and it is time for you to get up and get ready for school, You are nervous about it, especially since it will be the first time you have ever been to a school. The past years you were training to use your fairy abilities, but now it is time for a whole different kind of experience. As you get up you stretch your arms, legs and wings out.

You then brush your brown hair, put on a blouse and a skirt, then your socks and shoes. Once you are finished getting dressed you go out of your bedroom and then you fly onto your father arm and give it a bit of a hug.

" Good Morning Dad." you say. As you continue to hug your dads arm. At your current height you were only about six inches tall, but at least you had the power of flight to help get you around. Your dad however was about six feet and two inches tall. Compared to you he seemed to be quite big at the moment.

" Good Morning Maggie, I see your still fairy sized, Not exactly sure how all that works, but breakfast is in the Kitchen." Your father said.

" I know, but this is the first time I'm going to school with so many different people, Maybe it would be better if I just stayed with other fairies?" You asked nervously uncertain of being around others, in fact it sort of made you feel small. Fortunately it was then that your mother came and interrupted your conversation.

" Maggie, we talked about this before, you need to meet other people aside from the ones your used to, Have some confidence I am pretty sure you will have a good time then, besides your part human too. So it is important for you to learn all aspects of your heritage and you wont always be around just fairies." Your mother said as she came and hugged her mother. Who was around the same height as she was at that time. Of course her mother was never really bigger then six inches tall. Often you even wondered how exactly they were able to have you on an occasion due to their size difference, but every time you asked your parents just evaded the question.

With your mother help You gained some confidence and after eating breakfast you had changed form being six inches tall to five feet and three inches tall. Thanks to their pep talk you were feeling better about going to school. Of course you were still nervous about whether or not you'd be bale to make any friends.

" I never get used to that, every time I get bigger my clothes rip apart, why don't yours Maggie?" Your father asked.

" That's easy dad, they are enchanted clothing with magical properties, so all my stuff grows and shrinks whenever I change size, I already told you this several times before." You replied to your father's question. He then just simply nodded and then you went off to school. At the time you were sure it was going to be a great day, and perhaps even make some friends along the way. On the other hand it was all possible, your wing even grow when you get human sized. So there was no tell what the school day could mean for you.
152.title: Maggie Springs

choices: A Human Comes to your rescue!
A Female Elf Hlelps you out!
1522.content:
You went and packed your bags for school it would be the first non fairy school you had ever attended. The good thing about that was it wouldn't be accidentally wrecked if you were human size. You then went and walked to school. Sure you could use your wings to fly if you chose to. But the city had a law that all people flying with their wings must get their Wing License first, normally for a fairy and when your six inches tall it doesn't matter. However when your human sized it matter quite a bit.

Fortunately your school wasn't that far away and as you stood outside and looked at it you saw several other creatures enter the building as well. A minotaur, a Centaur, dwarf's, elves, werewolves and even a few other fairies. Unfortunately none of which you knew. Still nervous about the whole new school thing you quickly entered and went to the auditorium. It was where all the student's were heading on their first day and where they would get their class assignments.

" Welcome to Mythic City High School, A school for all sorts of creatures, don't be shy this school will accommodate your needs. I know some of you might have rather unique needs, but don't worry will be sure to educate you as well. We've got quite a bit of history to cover." The speaker at the auditorium said. you didn't know who she was but from what you could tell she looked to be a Harpy. You went and got your class schedule and when you looked you were relieved at some of the classes others you were a bit nervous about.

Your first period class was History of the Fae. Or in other words History of the fairies it was something you were confident you could pass. Your second period Class was Algebra, you groaned at that as you didn't exactly like doing math. Then their was your Third period class. Mythical Creatures Flight Laws and Regulations. It was a basic class that reminds you of all the laws regarding flying in the city whether your six inches tall or bigger. Fourth period was your lunch break and then you had only three more classes to attend. Unfortunately they weren't exactly subjects you were comfortable in. Physical Education or P.E. was right after lunch and your fifth period. As for Sixth period the class was something you had no idea if you would be any good at it. However you think a lot of people might be frightened off by a class called Ancient Linguistics. Then there was you final class of the day. This class was simply called English. You weren't sure but something about that class just seemed to unnerve you. It wasn't a language class, yet it was one of the required classes for you to take.

As you were absorbed into your schedule you had the misfortune of accidentally bumping into someone, at the time you didn't see them. You then quickly went to apologize to them.

" I'm sorry I didn't see you there." You said to him. As you looked up you saw that you had bumped into a Minotaur.

" That will be twenty dollars." He said.

" I don't understand I said sorry, shouldn't that be enough?" you asked. But the Minotaur quickly and replied in an angry voice. you were scared and at the moment felt as if he were literally getting bigger each and every time you saw him. Then you quickly realize he wasn't getting bigger but you were slowly returning to your fairy size again.

" I said twenty dollars, you bumped into me and now your going to pay me or else!"

You were now back to being six inches tall and the minotaur who was picking on you was looking bigger and scarier every moment you looked at him. You eventually give in and reach for your wallet and grab what money you had, unfortunately you didn't have twenty dollars and this was supposed to be your lunch money, but then what else could you have done? As you then use your wings to fly up and give the Minotaur what little money you have...
1522.title: Maggie  Encounters a Bully

choices: Shrank back down to Fairy Size
Could Only speak in the Fairy Language
15221.content:
A human from the school come by and slaps the money right out of your hand before you could even say a word. The human looked at the teenage Minotaur and spoke.

" She doesn't need to give you anything! She apologized that should be enough." He said to the teen-aged Minotaur. Shortly after that the Minotaur huffed in frustration and anger, then glared at the Human boy with an insidious smirk.

" This isn't human affairs, She's going to pay me one way or another. And Nothing you can say will change my mind. So stay out of affairs, that aren't yours to begin with!" The Minotaur yelled and made a loud roar. Yet the human who helped you managed to remain calm.

" She goes to this school, That is enough reason for me to help. Besides I wouldn't do anything more, the teachers are just about to come down the hall." He said confidently. The Minotaur was about to get violent but after hearing the teachers were coming he then ran off, but not before getting a few more words in.

" This Isn't Over!" He yelled and ran off. With the Minotaur gone you got your look at a young human boy around your age with Brown hair and blue eyes. He was wearing a red shirt and tan pants. With the bully gone you returned to your human size. It was then that he gave you and smiled and said.

" Hello, My name is Aaron, It's nice to meet you." As he said that he reached for your money and gave it back to you. It was shortly after that. Your hands touched each other and you felt an unusual feeling. It was similar yet different from what you had about your parents. You then spoke to him.

" Hello, I am Maggie Springs, Spank my butt." Somehow despite you wanted to say Thanks a lot to him. You had accidentally said to him to Spank your Butt. You couldn't help to feel embarrassed. Your face was completely red, after that awkward moment you....
15221.title: Slapped out Of the Hand

choices: The Bully Minotaur Was in this Class
Both the Minotaur and Aaron were in this Class
152211.content: Quickly got up and ran away to hide, you felt a sort of uncomfortable around Aaron. Yet you had not known the reason. Aaron didn't give up looking for you. " Maggie? " Aaron said as he searched for you. You heard him call your name and it oddly pleased you to hear him call for you. Yet for some reason you couldn't speak to him like you would normally. Eventually lunch came to a close and you had finally had to go to the remaining of your classes. As you headed towards your sixth period class. You hoped that you wouldn't have any more of this awkward situation. However that was not the case as soon as you entered into your Fifth period, which for you was Physical Education, otherwise known as P.E. you saw that....
152211.title: What is this Feeling?

153.content:
My name is Vlad Bloodstone and I am a 15 year old vampire living in the business district. Looking to go to an elite High school for the most prestigious of Vampire's. Of course someone as naturally gifted as me can only be destined for greatness. I have a mother and a father and they are very high upon the Vampire council if I do say so myself. Which of Course makes me even the better fit for the academy. Little did I know that my fate had other plans that day.

" Greetings, common and ordinary youths, prepared to be dazzled as I am about to make my entrance to the most elite of vampire academies here in Mythic City." I said while talking in front of the mirror. Ordinary Mirrors and phones really can't capture the essence of a vampire. But enchanted Mirror's and phone's can literally capture my image for all of those common folks to see. It was during this time that my mother had entered the room with the letter for the most prestigious Vampire Academy in the city. I was so sure I passed the test, yet the look upon my mother's face was complicated at best. It was as if she knew something that would possibly upset me.

" Vlad, we got the letter from the Vampire Academy and..." I interrupted my mother before she could finish speaking. She never like's when I do that but than again someone as magnificent as myself can get away with an interruption or two.

" I am sure they found my to be the most magnificent specimen of a vampire there is, and our begging to let me into their academy. Well I whole heartily accept them groveling at my feet." I said.

" You were not accepted Vlad!" my mother told me flat out. Her way of speaking was direct and to the point. I was in awe at the time. After all how could an Elite Academy of Vampire's decline someone of my greatness?

" How could they decline someone of my greatness? Surely I have proved myself to be worthy of their Academy?" I asked my mother, to which she quickly replied.

" You're not that great Vlad, and you haven't done anything for the Vampire's of the city. So far you have only been living in the shadow of me and your father's accomplishments. It's time you stop promoting yourself and learn to put others before you Vlad. A community needs to work together, and so far you just gloat about how great you are all the time. Yet haven't proved to be great at least according to their letter."

" Your saying I have yet to prove myself to be great? Or helped others. Nonsense I remember the test they gave and I made it through perfectly unharmed." I told my mother, but then she countered my argument of the reason of my nonacceptance.

" You made it unharmed, but that was only because of your teammates protecting you. When it came to endangering your team mates you used them as cannon fodder for all the traps in that test. Which is why you made it unharmed yet your unwilling to take any other blows for your team that you were assigned." My mother said.

" That is their reason, yet I see no reason I shouldn't have been accepted. It a shame though if only they had disliked me on one of my social media pages, I could dislike them too. But alas it was not meant for me to dislike them." I said while I was talking about that my mother groaned as if she was sort of annoyed at me. Yet she still had some more news for me.

" Vlad you are going to Mythic City High School, it is a common high school, but I think it'll do you some good. I told you before you need to learn to put others before yourself, and maybe going to this high school will help you with that." My mother told me, as for myself my reaction to the news of going to some commoner's school was well, Let's just say I was....
153.title: Vlad Bloodstone

choices: I got lost trying to Find my Way to the School
No one would look at me!
1531.content:
I was appalled at the idea my mother had just suggested. She suggested that I The Great Vlad Bloodstone be enrolled in a school with the common folk! The travesty of such events were completely unheard of, so naturally I did the only thing a child could do when they don't get what they want. I complained, complained and complained. Surely eventually my mother would give in to the complaints of someone as great as me.

" Mother, A Common High School setting, doesn't suit someone with my greatness. I demand that I be put in a private school with worth people of knowing my greatness." I said. Unfortunately I didn't realize it then, but I had made a terrible mistake in my words upon complaining I had told my mother I was demanding this. I can tell you for sure that statement didn't go well for me.

" You Demand huh? Well that Settles it, your going to Mythic City High School. It's going to be public and your going to make friends. Is that understood Vlad." My mother said as she looked at me with an icy cold glare form my previous poor choice of words. I had completely doomed myself to the Mediocrity that would be known as Public Schooling.

Know that I had to go to a public school and not a private school. It was then that my mind had an epiphany! I would become an elite amongst these common folk, someone they would worship and respect! These commoners of this High School would know greatness. Not just any greatness mind you, but the Greatness of me Vlad Bloodstone, the greatest Vampire ever!

With a new attitude I began to imagine how I would gain and aid these folks to the point, where they would say. " Vlad Bloodstone he's the greatest guy I ever met! I went to bed and eagerly went to bed awaiting for my first day of school in Mythic City High. While my expectations of school were quite great. My first day of school would not go as I expected because of one reason. That reason being
1531.title: Commoners, NO Thank You

choices: Turn him to a Creature of the Sea
Explain Why Magic Wont work on Trash
154.content:
" I've had Enough of this! Put it in the trash Now!" Shelly yelled angrily at someone who just recently threw a piece of trash in the ocean. She had it with those who didn't care about any environments but their own. She wanted to teach them a lesson. Unfortunately this particular person couldn't care less about the little piece of paper in the water.

" Like I care, it's just paper it'll dissolve real quickly." He said to the Mermaid in a mocking tone. This irritated Shelly to no end. But she was going to get him to pick it up no matter the situation.

" It's your trash, Not mine you need to be responsible for it. Otherwise your decision will impact thousands of the people. Living here." Shelly explained to the man, unfortunately for Shelly the man had just scoffed at the idea.

" So what, you have magic. You can just magic it up out of there and get it out, simple as that." He told Shelly, while still not caring for this one piece of litter in the harbor. Shelly was angered by this, For all her life she had to deal with people and pollution. Living a life under the sea, she saw exactly how it affected other people. She also knew that you couldn't get rid of trash threw magic. As it would clog the magical energies of the world resulting in complete chaos for the magic community. A lesson that this guy wouldn't even know of due to the fact that he is completely human. She had to find a way to make this human see the light and be respectful towards the idea. However his mentioning of Magic gave her an idea. She could try to turn him to a creature of the sea and show him, why he shouldn't just hurl things into the sea. Or perhaps she should just focus her environmental ideas on a bigger scale, then just this one guy. Or she could just explain why magic wont work, after all he doesn't know about why no one with magic doesn't use magic on trash. Eventually Shelly decided to..
154.title: Shelly Prawn

155.title: Create My Own Character

info.brief_description: A Tale of Mythological and Supernatural creatures living in a Modern City Setting.
info.description:
Introduction


Welcome to Mythic City a tale of supernatural and Mythical Creatures living in a city, with humans and all sorts of otherworldly beings. This story will take place mostly in this city. Unlike previous stories there is no detailing of the main character here as you will be able to get to choose who will it be.


The Story




For as long as the world existed creatures of supernatural phenomenon and Mythical creatures have lived hidden away from prying eyes for centuries. ensuring that the dreaded past and hunts for such creatures began. It was a long and hard journey for some the wounds had never healed and trust between humans was never going to happen again. That is until a mysterious incident got rid of the barrier that kept humans from discovering the locations of these creatures. No one was sure who or why such a barrier that was all over the planet Earth had been teared down, nor did they know of who. However it meant that they could no longer hide from humans anymore and thus creatures of Myth, legend and supernatural were once again seen upon our world.


At first much friction still remained, however eventually the humans and creatures finally made a bold decision. They would build a city where all the races would live in harmony. Of course some were against such an idea and others sought it as a way to gather up all the creatures in one place so they could ignore them. While worst yet there were some groups who would still try to hunt these creatures of myth and legend down. Which to many just proved how distrustful humans could be. Despite the arguments the city was built.


Twenty years later Mythic City stands at the pinnacle of inter species relations. While there are still some opposition. Most people who lived there had grown used to and accustomed to the various city. The cries of untrustworthy humans were slowly dampening as most Humans in the city. With all sorts of Mythological and Supernatural creatures in this city one has to wonder, What is it like to live in Mythic City, City of Myth, Legends and Humans all living side by side?


Rules


1. Try to write at least a paragraph
2. Check for Spelling Errors Please
3. This Story is Pg- 13 so don't do anything above that.
4. Have fun!
